name: $AURA
description: Aura Coin, $AURA, is the first Advanced Marketplace coin that adds value and utility to web3 traders, projects, and creators. Aura coin will launch initially in late 2023 on the Ethereum chain as a token and be swapped to the Aura chain as a coin in 2024. The Aura chain will be a robust, secure, and efficient chain to help power the industry and forge a new path for the future. $AURA upholds the fundamental elements of the Aura ecosystem giving back to the community with unrivaled revenue sharing. Aura - Lighting the path!
